abstract: Miami Journal; Twitter handle FloridaMan has achieved wide following by documenting foibles of criminals, hucksters, drug addicts and other colorful characters in Sunshine State; author of account remains anonymous, but his 1,600 tweets have earned following of some 270,000 by documenting crimes and bizarre accidents perpetrated in state.
lead_paragraph: A beguilingly anonymous Twitter author with the mug shot of an Indiana man unspools, tweet by tweet, a composite of Florida’s nuttiness.

headline.main: @_FloridaMan Beguiles With the Hapless and Harebrained
headline.print_headline: @_Florida Man, Sleepy Thieves, Killer Gators, Battling Brides

snippet: A beguilingly anonymous Twitter author with the mug shot of an Indiana man unspools, tweet by tweet, a composite of Florida’s nuttiness.
